dmca.title: TRUCK ADS TRADEMARK INFRINGEMENT NOTICE - xpmultimedia.com
dmca.body:
t

________________________________

From: Rod Harris [mailto:rodharris@truckads.com] 
Posted At: Thursday, July 20, 2006 2:46 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: TRUCK ADS TRADEMARK INFRINGEMENT NOTICE - xpmultimedia.com
Subject: TRUCK ADS TRADEMARK INFRINGEMENT NOTICE - xpmultimedia.com


1ST REQUEST TO HOST
2ND REQUEST TO WEBSITE OWNER
 
I AM SENDING A COPY OF THIS TO YOU BECAUSE YOUR CUSTOMER IS INFRINGING
ON OUR TRADEMARKS. PLEASE ADVISE YOUR CUSTOMER TO IMMEDIATELY REMOVE THE
INFRINGING CONTENT FROM THIS WEBSITE OR REMOVE THE WEBSITE FROM THE
INTERNET. THIS SITE IS INFRINGING ON OUR MARKS. YOUR FULL COOPERATION IN
THIS MATTER IS APPRECIATED.


-----Original Message-----
From: Rod Harris [mailto:rodharris@truckads.com] 
Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2006 8:35 AM
To: 'Damian Gonzalez (damian@xpmultimedia.com)'; 'ads@xpmultimedia.com'
Subject: TRUCK ADS TRADEMARK INFRINGEMENT NOTICE - xpmultimedia.com


Mr. Gonzalez:

We are requesting that you cease and desist all use of the term TRUCK
ADS because you are infringing on our trademarks. This claim of
trademark infringement is in accordance with the federally established
Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA).

The MARK: TRUCKADS (r.n.2838348), TRUCK ADS (r.n.3027883) and TRUCKADS
ADVERTISING IN THE FAST LANE (r.n. # 2804676) are claimed to be
infringed.

The name, post office address and telephone number of the owner of the
marks identified above are as follows:

TRUCK ADS, LLC
2028 VIRGINIA AVENUE
MCLEAN, VA 22101
PH: 703-538-6711

The goods and services covered by or offered under the marks identified
above are as follows:

Word Mark TRUCK ADS
Goods and Services IC 016. US 002 005 022 023 029 037 038 050. G & S:
VINYL ADHESIVE DECALS AND FITTED STRETCH VINYL DECALS APPLIED TO THE
EXTERIOR SIDES OF CARS, TRUCKS AND MOTORIZED VEHICLES. FIRST USE:
19960207. FIRST USE IN COMMERCE: 19960613.

Word Mark TRUCKADS
Goods and Services IC 035. US 100 101 102. G & S: advertising and public
relations services, namely, the rental of advertising space on trucks,
taxi's and internet web sites. FIRST USE: 19960207. FIRST USE IN
COMMERCE: 19960207.

Word Mark TRUCKADS ADVERTISING IN THE FAST LANE
Goods and Services IC 035. US 100 101 102. G & S: advertising and public
relations services, namely, the rental of advertising space on trucks,
taxi's and internet web sites. FIRST USE: 19971114. FIRST USE IN
COMMERCE: 19971114.

The date of first use of the marks identified above was FEBRUARY 7, 1996
and NOVEMBER 14, 1997.

The date of first use in interstate commerce of the marks identified
above is JUNE 13, 1996 and FEBRUARY 7, 1996 respectively.

The mark the Complaining Party, TRUCK ADS, LLC believes is an
infringement of its marks is TRUCK ADS.

The goods and services covered by or offered under the marks claimed to
be infringing are as follows:

Word Mark TRUCK ADS
Goods and Services IC 016. US 002 005 022 023 029 037 038 050. G & S:
VINYL ADHESIVE DECALS AND FITTED STRETCH VINYL DECALS APPLIED TO THE
EXTERIOR SIDES OF CARS, TRUCKS AND MOTORIZED VEHICLES. FIRST USE:
19960207. FIRST USE IN COMMERCE: 19960613

Word Mark TRUCKADS
Goods and Services IC 035. US 100 101 102. G & S: advertising and public
relations services, namely, the rental of advertising space on trucks,
taxi's and internet web sites. FIRST USE: 19960207. FIRST USE IN
COMMERCE: 19960207

Word Mark TRUCKADS ADVERTISING IN THE FAST LANE
Goods and Services IC 035. US 100 101 102. G & S: advertising and public
relations services, namely, the rental of advertising space on trucks,
taxi's and internet web sites. FIRST USE: 19971114. FIRST USE IN
COMMERCE: 19971114.

The precise location of the marks that are claimed to be infringing are
located on every page on the following website: www.xpmultimedia.com
<http://www.xpmultimedia.com>  
http://www.xpmultimedia.com/catering_truck_ads.html
<http://www.xpmultimedia.com/catering_truck_ads.html>  


This is a good faith certification, signed under penalty of perjury that
the mark TRUCK ADS infringes the rights of TRUCK ADS, LLC who owns the
marks TRUCKADS, TRUCK ADS and TRUCKADS ADVERTISING IN THE FAST LANE and
that the use of the mark TRUCK ADS is not authorized by us and is not
defensible. The above information is true and I am authorized to act on
behalf of the trademark owner.

If the  term is not removed by COB Friday 7/7/06, this notification will
be forwarded to your hosting company.

Sincerely,




Regards... Rod

Rod Harris
CEO
